mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO spring_method_table (class_name, method_name, method_desc, path, restful_type, jar_id) VALUES
(#{item.className}, #{item.methodName}, #{item.methodDesc}, #{item.path}, #{item.restfulType}, #{item.jarId})
mapper.select: SELECT m.method_name, m.class_name, m.method_desc, m.path, m.restful_type, m.jar_id, jt.jar_name FROM spring_method_table m LEFT JOIN jar_table jt ON m.jar_id = jt.jid WHERE m.class_name = #{className} ORDER BY m.jar_id ASC, m.path COLLATE NOCASE ASC, m.method_name ASC, m.method_desc ASC
